greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse Moebius transform of A001511.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (terms 1..1000 from Andrew Howroyd)
formula: Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(s)^2 * 2^s/(2^s-1). - _Ralf Stephan_, Jun 17 2007, corrected by _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 02 2019
Sum_{k=1..n} a(k) ~ 2*n * (2*gamma - 1 + log(n/2)), where gamma is the Euler-Mascheroni constant A001620. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 02 2019
Multiplicative with a(2^e) = (e+1)*(e+2)/2, and a(p^e) = e+1 for p > 2. - _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 30 2020
mathematica: f[p_, e_] := If[p==2, (e+1)*(e+2)/2, e+1]; a[1] = 1; a[n_] := Times @@ (f @@@ FactorInteger[n]); Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 30 2020 *)
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, May 31 2007
